content: there should be 25 garter ridges ending with a ws row 159 sts weave in loose ends pattern using colour b work increase pattern once finishing using colour a work garter tab cast on wet block as follows soak shawl in water using colour a work increase pattern once garter tab cast on cast on 3 sts knit 6 adding gentle wool wash if desired for at row at the end of the last row do not turn using colour b work increase pattern 10 least 10 minutes rinse and wrap in towel work to the other side rotate your work 90 times 231 sts squeezing to remove excess water block the degrees clockwise so that you see the long shawl aggressively selvedges may be a little using colour c work increase pattern once side of the garter stitch rectangle pick up and taut leave in place to dry when completely knit 3 sts along the side 1 st in each garter using colour b work increase pattern once dry trim yarn ends enjoy stitch ridge rotate your work again then pick using colour c work increase pattern 7 up and knit 3 sts at the cast on edge total of 9 times 285 sts sts on needle turn to work ws row using colour d work increase pattern once setup row ws knit across marking the center stitch with a stitch marker using colour c work increase pattern once setup row 1 rs k2 m1l k2 m1l k1 cs using colour d work increase pattern 5 m1r k2 m1r k2 times 327 sts setup row 2 ws k2 m1l k to last two sts using colour e work increase pattern once m1r k2 15 sts using colour d work increase pattern once using colour e work increase pattern 4 times 363 sts version 1 01 all images text and charts
